p: The emergence of CRF74_01B further highlights the continuous inter-genotypic recombination processes between the various genotypes and recombinants that are circulating among the various risk groups in Malaysia. It also prompted the necessity of vigilant surveillance on the genetic diversity of HIV-1 epidemics in Malaysia, since it has increased tremendously with the description of the CRF33_01B, CRF48_01B, CRF52_01B, CRF53_01B, CRF54_01B, CRF58_01B and the latest addition of CRF74_01B.
